UpdateRow: UPDATE dimcategory cat SET cat.CategoryName = ?, cat.IsActive = ?, cat.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE cat.CategoryKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimcategory (CategoryKey, CategoryName, IsActive, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT cat.CategoryKey, cat.CategoryName, cat.IsActive, cat.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimcategory cat WHERE cat.CategoryKey = ?
